name: Extreme Forge
pages: The Extreme forge is 50x more faster than the vanilla furnace, with 2 additional smelting slots, below is the recipe for it. This forge can use any of these $(l:upgrades)upgrades/$, and requires the $(l:patchouli:furnaces/extreme_furnace)extreme furnace/$ to craft. Additionally it requires 3 $(l:patchouli:items/netherhot_conductor_blocks)netherhot conductor blocks/$ in its recipe.
